summary: Completed e2e testing of AI Infographic Generator feature using Nano Banana (Gemini). All 11 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI loads correctly at /infographic route with full image generation workflow working.
critical_code_review_comments: Infographic Generator uses real Nano Banana AI (Gemini) - no mocking
Image generation takes ~20-60 seconds - appropriate loading states shown
All 5 templates available: product_showcase, features_highlight, comparison, lifestyle, bundle
All 5 background styles available: white, gradient, studio, minimal, luxury
Both Uzum Market (1080x1440px) and Yandex Market (1000x1000px) supported

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all UI elements working, image generation successful)

seed_data_creation: None - used test products: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G, iPhone 15 Pro Max
context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Infographic Generator feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: GET /api/infographic/templates (returns 5 templates, 5 backgrounds, 2 marketplaces), POST /api/infographic/generate (creates AI-generated product infographic). Frontend route: /infographic. Image generation takes 20-60 seconds. Generated images include base64 data and metadata. Download and 'Create new' buttons work correctly.

features_tested.get_templates_api: PASS - Returns 5 templates with id, name, name_ru, description
features_tested.get_backgrounds_api: PASS - Returns 5 background styles: white, gradient, studio, minimal, luxury
features_tested.get_marketplaces_api: PASS - Returns Uzum (1080x1440px) and Yandex (1000x1000px) info
features_tested.generate_infographic_api: PASS - Creates AI-generated product image with base64 data
features_tested.product_name_input: PASS - Input field with data-testid='product-name-input' works
features_tested.quick_template_buttons: PASS - 5 quick template buttons visible and clickable
features_tested.generate_button: PASS - Button with data-testid='generate-btn' triggers generation
features_tested.loading_state: PASS - Shows 'AI rasm yaratmoqda... (30-60 sekund)' during generation
features_tested.image_preview: PASS - Generated image displays correctly in preview area
features_tested.download_button: PASS - 'Yuklab olish' button visible after generation
features_tested.create_new_button: PASS - 'Yangi yaratish' button visible after generation
features_tested.ready_badge: PASS - 'Tayyor' badge shown when image is ready

api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/infographic/generate (basic): PASS - Generates image with product_name, brand, features
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/infographic/generate (empty fe: PASS - Works with empty features array
